links: J.-M. Sixdeniers, K. A. Penson and A. I. Solomon, Extended Bell and Stirling Numbers From Hypergeometric Exponentiation, J. Integer Seqs. Vol. 4 (2001), #01.1.4.
formula: a(n) = s(n, k) = Sum_{pi} n!/(k(1)! * 1!^k(1) * k(2)! * 2!^k(2) * ... * k(n)! * n!^k(n)) * (n!/(1!^k(1) * 2!^k(2) * ... * n!^k(n)))^L, where pi runs through all partitions k(1) +2 * k(2)+...+n * k(n) = n such that k = k(1)+k(2)+...+k(n), with k = 3 and L = 1.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 18 2001
extensions: Formula and more terms from _Vladeta Jovovic_, Dec 09 2001
